mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER ( CUST_NM, AGE, GENDER, PHONE, POST_CODE, ADDR1, ADDR2 ) VALUES ( #{custNm}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{postCode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMER SET CUST_NM = #{custNm}, AGE = #{age}, GENDER = #{gender}, PHONE = #{phone}, POST_CODE = #{postCode}, ADDR1 = #{addr1}, ADDR2 = #{addr2} WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
